title: Sketchbook Folio, "Two Studies of Sybils", ca. 1815
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and dark brown wash, over traces of black chalk white wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at center: Anibale Caracci Roma; at lower margin: 43 Anibale Caracci Roma
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Upper drawing of seated Sybil, facing front, flanked by putti, one with tablet. Lower drawing of seated Sybil, with two putti at center holding tablet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Two Studies of Sybils", ca. 1815.
ca. 1815. Pen and brown ink, brush and dark brown wash, over traces of black chalk white wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3512.
